What_i_learn_at_this_course: <1>Theory of software testing("testing","bug-reports","documentation","types of testing","methods","SDLC","STLC", "and_etc")</1> <2>What is a client server arhitechture</2> <3>Server request methods</3> <4>Server responses</4> <5>Structure request and response</5> <6>What is a Json,XML and structure them</6> <7>Testing API</7> <8>logs and reading logs</8> <9>Postman,Fidler</9> <10>VPN:"how does it work and other"</10> <11>Dev Tools</11> <12>Mobile testing</12> <13>Gidelines iOS and Android</13> <14>Building applications on Xcode</14> <15>Building applications on Andoroid Studio</15> <16>Sniffing on Charles</16> <17>Proxy on Android and Iphone</17> <18>Terminal and Linux Ubuntu</17> <19>Simple bash scripting , Automatization of rouitne tasks</20> <20>Access to remote servers </20> <21>SQL:"Create , Delete , Drop , Insert into , Select , From , Where ,Join"</21> <22>Git</22> <23>Jmeter</23> <24>Scrum</24> <25>Phyton : "creating your own client-server application"</25>
